aircraft.value: Cerberus Defense - AC-1124-648 at Maintenance Hub-Y

defect_observed.value: Bleed air leak detection. Malfunction reported by flight crew.

root_cause.value: Design limitation in component load capacity under extreme conditions

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective De-icing System component. Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.

corrective_action.value: Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity

preventive_action.value: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type

remarks_investigation.value: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 01/01/2025 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 04/01/2025 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 06/01/2025 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 07/01/2025 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design authority review completed. Recommend continued airworthiness monitoring of affected component type. Date: 11/01/2025 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer
